name: song
trans: n. 歌曲；歌唱；诗歌；鸣声

sentences.english: We used to listen to pop songs on the radio.
sentences.chinese: 我们以前常常听收音机里播放的流行歌曲。

sentences.english: They sat round with guitars, singing folk songs.
sentences.chinese: 他们弹着吉他围坐在一起唱民歌。

sentences.english: ...dance, music, mime, and song.

detailed_translations.english: a short piece of music with words that you sing

name: come on
trans: na. (演员)出台；进行(很好)；(暴风雨等)起；(病,苦痛等)加深

sentences.english: Come on, darling, we'll be late.
sentences.chinese: 快点，亲爱的，我们要迟到了。

detailed_translations.english: You say `Come on' to someone to encourage them to hurry up

sentences.english: black trousers teamed with a bright shirt
You can team up with one other class member if you want.
sentences.chinese: 例句：如果你愿意的话，可以找一个同学组成一组。

detailed_translations.english: to put two things or people together, because they will look good or work well together

sentences.english: I gave up eating meat a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 我几个月以前开始不吃肉了。

sentences.english: raw meat
a meat pie
a selection of cold meats

detailed_translations.english: the flesh of animals and birds eaten as food

name: noodles
trans: n. 面条，挂面（noodle的复数形式)

sentences.english: Do you like rice or noodles?
They like to eat hamburgers, pizza and sandwiches but we always eat rice, congee, and noodles.
sentences.chinese: 他们喜欢吃汉堡包，比萨饼和三明治，但是我们总是吃米饭，稀粥和面条。

sentences.english: Have you ever eaten noodles before?

detailed_translations.english: Noodles are long, thin strips of pasta. They are used especially in Chinese and Italian cooking.

sentences.english: a tasty sauce served with rice or pasta
sentences.chinese: 配米饭或意面的美味酱汁

sentences.english: a plate of brown rice
Serve with plain boiled rice .
a few grains of rice

detailed_translations.english: a food that consists of small white or brown grains that you boil in water until they become soft enough to eat

name: ginger
trans: n. 姜；姜黄色；精力；有姜味
vt. 用姜给…调味；使某人有活力

sentences.english: a ginger cat

detailed_translations.english: a root with a very strong hot taste, or the powder made from this root, that is used in cooking

detailed_translations.chinese: 用姜给…调味；使某人有活力

detailed_translations.english: hair or fur that is ginger is bright orange-brown in colour

name: nice
trans: adj. 精密的；美好的；细微的；和蔼的

sentences.english: They’ve got a very nice house.
Did you have a nice time?
It’s such a nice day (= good weather ), why not go for a swim?
sentences.chinese: 天气真好，为什么不去游泳呢？

sentences.english: What a nice surprise!
One of the nice things about Christmas is having all the family together.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节的一个好处是全家可以聚首一堂。

detailed_translations.english: pleasant, attractive, or enjoyable

sentences.english: We have full stereo sound, video, 35 mm slides.
sentences.chinese: 我们有立体声、视频及35 毫米幻灯片。

sentences.english: The screen is now flush with the case and we’ve decreased the overall thickness to about 18 mm.
sentences.chinese: 现在的屏幕已经和外壳在同一平面上，而且我们已经将总厚度压缩到18毫米。

sentences.english: Chop the onions finely.
red onions
home-made onion soup

detailed_translations.english: a round white vegetable with a brown, red, or white skin and many layers. Onions have a strong taste and smell.

sentences.english: I like ice cream and cookies as much as the next guy. But I hate how it makes me feel afterward.
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冰淇淋和曲奇，但我又讨厌吃完之后所带给我的感受，疲倦，瞌睡，精力不集中等等。

sentences.english: If you enjoy chocolate ice cream, as I do, when confronted with a tub of it would you also enjoy eating as much of the tub as possible?
sentences.chinese: 如果你像我一样喜欢吃巧克力冰淇淋，那么当你面前放着一桶这样的冰淇淋时，你是否会敞开肚子尽量多吃呢？

sentences.english: On the morning of the stroke, I woke up to a pounding pain behind my left eye. And it was the kind of pain, caustic pain, that you get when you bite into ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 那 天早上，我从睡梦中醒来，发现自己的左脑疼痛不止，那种痛楚跟你咬冰淇淋的那种腐蚀性的感觉一样，它抓住我，然后又放开，然后再次抓住，再次放开。

name: banana
trans: n. 香蕉；喜剧演员；大鹰钩鼻

sentences.english: The area is under banana cultivation.
The banana bears two crops every year.
He told me that the palm of banana hefted 5 pounds.
sentences.chinese: 他说那把香蕉称重为5磅。

detailed_translations.english: a long curved tropical fruit with a yellow skin

name: apple
trans: n. 苹果，苹果树，苹果似的东西；[美俚]炸弹，手榴弹，（棒球的）球；[美俚]人，家伙。

sentences.english: apple pie
an apple tree
roast pork and apple sauce (=  a thick sauce made from cooked apples  )

detailed_translations.english: a hard round fruit that has red, light green, or yellow skin and is white inside

sentences.english: a bottle of milk
Would you like some milk in your tea?
a pint of semi-skimmed milk
I helped to milk the cows.

detailed_translations.english: a white liquid produced by cows or goats that is drunk by people
to take milk from a cow or goat

sentences.english: orange juice
orange peel
Peel the oranges and divide them into segments.
sentences.chinese: 把橙子去皮，然后切成片。

sentences.english: orange groves (= where orange trees grow )

detailed_translations.english: a round fruit that has a thick orange skin and is divided into parts inside

sentences.english: Try to eat plenty of fresh fruit .
fruit and vegetables
a glass of fruit juice
a large garden with fruit trees
I’m looking forward to retirement and having time to enjoy the fruits of my labour (= the results of my hard work ) .
sentences.chinese: 我盼望着退休，好有时间来享受自己的劳动成果。

detailed_translations.english: something that grows on a plant, tree, or bush, can be eaten as a food, contains seeds or a stone, and is usually sweet

name: Here you are.
trans: [口语]；我们(或你，你们)到了!；这就是我们(或你，你们)所要的东西。

sentences.english: B: Here you are. Anything else?
Can I eat now? Here you are.
MR HU:Here you are.You must look after your clothes!
sentences.chinese: 胡老师：给你。 你应该照看好你的衣服!

name: everything
trans: pron. 每件事物；最重要的东西；（有关的）一切；万事

sentences.english: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.chinese: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.english: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.chinese: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.english: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.chinese: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

detailed_translations.english: each thing or all things

sentences.english: He staked his tomato vines with bamboo.
sentences.chinese: 他用竹竿支撑起西红柿秧。

sentences.english: Secondly,put some tomato paste on the bread.
sentences.chinese: 第二，放一些西红柿在面包上粘贴。

sentences.english: The salmon was brought to the table whole, garnished with parsley and slices of tomato and cucumber.
sentences.chinese: 整条大麻哈鱼被端上了桌，并用欧芹、西红柿片和黄瓜片作为花色配菜。

detailed_translations.english: a round soft red fruit eaten raw or cooked as a vegetable

name: really
trans: adv. 实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）

sentences.english: Why don’t you tell us what really happened?
sentences.chinese: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？

sentences.english: Oliver’s not really her brother.
sentences.chinese: 奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.english: I never know what he’s really thinking.
sentences.chinese: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.english: She seems unfriendly at first, but she’s really very nice.
sentences.chinese: 一开始她似乎并不友善，但其实她人很好。

detailed_translations.chinese: 真正地， 实际上； 很， 十分， 全然
detailed_translations.english: used when you are talking about what actually happened or is true, rather than what people might wrongly think

name: their
trans: pron. 他们的，她们的；它们的

sentences.english: They have their compensations.
My pulses, her pulses, their pulses.
sentences.chinese: 我的脉搏，她的脉搏，他们的脉搏。

sentences.english: In America, they go out with their friends.
sentences.chinese: 在美国，他们与他们的朋友出去。

name: favourite
trans: n. 特别喜爱的人（或物）

sentences.english: a child’s favourite toy
What’s your favourite colour?
a favorite spot for picnickers

detailed_translations.english: your favourite person or thing is the one that you like the most
something that you like more than other things of the same kind

sentences.english: She was wearing jeans and a T-shirt.

detailed_translations.english: a soft shirt with short  sleeves  and no collar

name: here is
trans: 这是；是简单的倒装句；在这里

sentences.english: a gentleman in evening dress
The play was performed in modern dress (= clothes from the present time ) .
sentences.chinese: 这出戏里演员是现代装束。

detailed_translations.english: clothes for men or women of a particular type or for a particular occasion

name: too
trans: adv. 太；也；很；还；非常；过度

sentences.english: Do you think the music’s too loud?
You’ve put too much salt in the soup.
There are too many cars on the road.

detailed_translations.english: more than is acceptable or possible

sentences.english: They had one daughter.
one hundred and twenty-one pounds
Come back at one (= one o’clock ).
Katie’s almost one (= one year old ).
The children seemed upset. One was crying.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子好像不开心，有一个在哭。

detailed_translations.english: the number 1
used to refer to a member of a group or pair of people or things

name: doesn't
trans: aux. 表示否定（等于does not）

sentences.english: His trousers were slightly too short.
I need a new pair of trousers for work.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一条上班穿的新裤子。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that covers the lower half of your body, with a separate part fitting over each leg

name: party
trans: n. 政党，党派；聚会，派对；当事人 [复数 parties]
vi. 参加社交聚会 [ 过去式 partied 过去分词 partied 现在分词 partying ]

sentences.english: We’re having a small party this evening to celebrate our wedding anniversary.
sentences.chinese: 我们今晚有个小聚会，庆祝我们的结婚纪念日。

sentences.english: the party spirit
I have always voted for the Labour Party.

detailed_translations.english: a social event when a lot of people meet together to enjoy themselves by eating, drinking, dancing etc

name: get up
trans: na. 起床；起身；站起来；叫…起床

sentences.english: I got up and walked over to where he was.
They have to get up early in the morning.

detailed_translations.english: When someone who is sitting or lying down gets up, they rise to a standing position

sentences.english: A team of volunteers were putting up posters .
sentences.chinese: 一队志愿者正在张贴海报。

sentences.english: a poster campaign for the election

detailed_translations.english: a large printed notice, picture, or photograph, used to advertise something or as a decoration

name: go to school
trans: na. 到校上课；上学去；开始求学

sentences.english: “Why would you ever go to school so far from home?” my friends would ask.
sentences.chinese: 我在那边的朋友们会问我：“为什么你回去离家那么远的地方上学？

sentences.english: The boy refuses to go to school on [under] the pretext of illness [an ailment, sickness].
In the morning, only one gate is open, through which parents head off to work and children go to school.
sentences.chinese: 每天早晨，只有一扇大门会打开，从这扇门出去父母们去上班，小孩们去上学。

sentences.english: Our guests have arrived.
Has anyone phoned?
We’ve been spending too much money.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经花掉太多钱了。

sentences.english: I hadn’t seen him for 15 years.
‘I hope you’ve read the instructions.’ ‘Yes, of course I have.’
sentences.chinese: “我希望你已经看过使用说明了。”“当然看过了。”

sentences.english: You haven’t done much, have you?
They used to have a Mercedes Benz.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾经拥有一辆奔驰汽车。

sentences.english: She sat down and had another drink.

detailed_translations.chinese: （与过去分词连用构成完成时）
detailed_translations.english: used with past participles to form perfect tenses
used to say that someone owns something or that it is available for them to use

sentences.english: What’s for lunch?

detailed_translations.english: a meal eaten in the middle of the day

sentences.english: After boating, they go to have lunch nearby.
sentences.chinese: 划过船以后，他们到附近去吃午饭。

sentences.english: "Where do you want to have lunch?, " I asked.
sentences.chinese: 我问她：“你想去哪里吃午饭啊？”

sentences.english: I have lunch at a restaurant with my colleagues.
sentences.chinese: 我跟同事一块儿在一家餐馆吃午饭。

name: home
trans: n. 家，住宅；产地；家乡；避难所
adj. 国内的，家庭的；有效的

sentences.english: They have a beautiful home in California.
sentences.chinese: 他们在加州有个美丽的家。

sentences.english: Good luck in your new home!
A family of birds made their home (= started living ) under the roof.
sentences.chinese: 一窝鸟在屋顶下安了家。

sentences.english: These children need a proper home life.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要正常的家庭生活。

detailed_translations.english: the house, apartment, or place where you live
relating to or belonging to your home or family

name: go home
trans: na. 回家；〈口〉死；(忠告等)刻骨铭心；击中

sentences.english: I've got to go home and zonk out.
He whispers to her: Let me go home with you.
sentences.chinese: 他向她喃喃低语：让我跟你一起回家吧。

sentences.english: Let them go home!

name: watch
trans: n. 手表；监视；守护；值班人
vt. 观察；注视；看守；警戒
vi. 观看，注视；守侯，看守

sentences.english: Do you mind if I watch?
We sat and watched the sunset.
Ruth could not bear to watch her parents arguing.
Most parents don’t know what their kids are watching on TV.
sentences.chinese: 大多数父母不知道自己的孩子都在看什么电视节目。

detailed_translations.english: to look at someone or something for a period of time, paying attention to what is happening
a small clock that you wear on your wrist or keep in your pocket

sentences.english: Drag up a chair and watch the TV.
sentences.chinese: 拖一把椅子坐到前面来看电视。

sentences.english: He threw his homework aside and watched TV.
sentences.chinese: 他把家庭作业抛到一边去看电视了。

sentences.english: He never switched off his TV, which always stayed on.
sentences.chinese: 他从来不关电视机，他的电视机始终开着。

sentences.english: I settled back to watch TV.
sentences.chinese: 我舒适地仰坐着看电视。

sentences.english: Have your dinner before you watch TV.
Do you always watch TV in the evening?

name: on
trans: adv. 向前地；作用中，行动中；继续着
prep. 向，朝……；关于；在……之上；在……时候
adj. 开着的；发生着的，正在进行中

sentences.english: I wanted to punch him on the nose.
sentences.chinese: 我真想一拳打到他鼻子上。

sentences.english: Matt kissed her on the cheek.

detailed_translations.english: used to say what part of someone or something is hit or touched

sentences.english: What are you doing Sunday?

detailed_translations.english: the day between Saturday and Monday

name: park
trans: n. 公园；[交] 停车场

sentences.english: Let’s go for a walk in the park.
a park bench
a flat overlooking Hyde Park
sentences.chinese: 一套可以俯瞰海德公园的公寓

detailed_translations.english: a large open area with grass and trees, especially in a town, where people can walk, play games etc

name: great
trans: n. 大师；大人物；伟人们
adj. 伟大的，重大的；极好的，好的；主要的

sentences.english: The movie was a great success.
The news came as possibly the greatest shock of my life.
sentences.chinese: 这个消息可能是我一生中最大的打击。

sentences.english: The paintings cost a great deal (= a lot ) of money.
John always takes great care over his work.
sentences.chinese: 约翰工作时总是非常小心。

sentences.english: It’s a great pity that none of his poems survive.
sentences.chinese: 非常遗憾，他的诗歌没有一首保存下来。

sentences.english: The temptation was too great to resist.
one of the greatest scientific achievements of our time
sentences.chinese: 我们这个时代最伟大的科学成就之一

detailed_translations.english: very large in amount or degree

name: goal
trans: n. 目标；球门，得分数；终点

sentences.english: Your goal as a parent is to help your child become an independent adult.
sentences.chinese: 身为父母，你的目标就是要培养孩子成为独立的成年人。

sentences.english: be in goal/keep goal (=be the goalkeeper)
I scored the first goal.

detailed_translations.english: something that you hope to achieve in the future

sentences.english: If that worked, hooray! If not, soldier on to the next step.
sentences.chinese: 如果这样行得通，万岁！如果还不行，那就迎着困难进行下一步吧

sentences.english: Some people have referred to documentaries like Blue Planet and Planet Earth as 'wildlife porn' – and I'd say hooray to that if it inspires viewers to get out into the natural world.
sentences.chinese: 有些人把《蓝色星球》和《行星地球》这样的纪录片称之为‘野生生命情色片’——如果它们能激发观众亲近自然，那我会为这样的情色高呼万岁。

name: live
trans: adj. 活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的

sentences.english: He lives just across the street from me.
We live only a few miles from the coast.
sentences.chinese: 我们住的地方离海边只有几英里远。

sentences.english: A rather odd family came tolive next door to us.
sentences.chinese: 有一户相当奇怪的人家搬到了我们隔壁。

sentences.english: As soon as I saw the place, I knew I didn’t want to live there.
sentences.chinese: 我一看到那地方，就觉得不想住在那儿。

sentences.english: Does Paul stilllive here?
We’re still looking for somewhere to live.
They’ve finally found a place to live.
sentences.chinese: 他们终于找到了住的地方。

sentences.english: Most seventeen-year-olds still live at home(= live with their parents ).
sentences.chinese: 17 岁的孩子大都还住在家里。

sentences.english: I’m quite happy living alone.
The house has 3,600 square feet of living space(= the areas of a house you live in ).
sentences.chinese: 这房子有3,600平方英尺的居住空间。

detailed_translations.english: if you live in a place, you have your home there
not dead or artificial

name: moon
trans: n. 月亮；月球；月光；卫星

sentences.english: the craters on the surface of the moon
The Americans landed on the Moon in 1969.
The moon appeared from behind a cloud.
The moon rose into the sky.
The moon was shining in the sky.
the moons of Saturn

detailed_translations.english: the round object that you can see shining in the sky at night, and that moves around the Earth every 28 days

name: sky
trans: vt. 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高
vi. 踢或击高空球；把桨叶翘得过高；飞涨

sentences.english: The sky grew dark, and a cold rain began to fall.
sentences.chinese: 天色转暗，开始下起冰冷的雨来。

sentences.english: A shooting star sped across the sky.

detailed_translations.english: the space above the earth where clouds and the sun and stars appear

detailed_translations.chinese: 把…投向空中；把…挂得过高

sentences.english: The nearest big city was St. Louis.
sentences.chinese: 最近的大城市是圣路易斯。

detailed_translations.english: a large important town

sentences.english: How do you spell your name?
How can I help you?
I’d like to help in some way, but I’m not sure how.
sentences.chinese: 我想帮点忙，可不知道该怎么做。

sentences.english: He explained how the system worked.
sentences.chinese: 他讲解了该系统是如何运转的。

sentences.english: We both used to work at the airport – that’s how we met.
sentences.chinese: 我们俩都曾经在机场工作过，我们就是这么认识的。

sentences.english: advice on how best (= the best way ) to invest your money
sentences.chinese: 如何以最好方式进行投资的建议

sentences.english: They had a number of suggestions as to how the service could be improved.
sentences.chinese: 他们有一些关于如何改进服务的建议。

sentences.english: This still leaves the question of how local services should be funded.
sentences.chinese: 这仍然没有解决如何为地方公共服务业提供资金的问题。

sentences.english: How many kids do they have now?

detailed_translations.english: used to ask or talk about the way in which something happens or is done

name: train
trans: n. 火车；行列；长队；裙裾

sentences.english: We went all the way to Inverness by train.
sentences.chinese: 我们一路坐火车到因弗内斯。

detailed_translations.english: a set of several carriages that are connected to each other and pulled along a railway line by an engine
to teach someone the skills of a particular job or activity, or to be taught these skills

name: chug
trans: vi. 发出轧轧声；发出嘎嚓声；发出轧轧声前进

sentences.english: The train chugs down the track.
sentences.chinese: 火车沿着轨道嘎嚓嘎嚓地缓慢行驶着。

sentences.english: I took a bus to San Francisco.
sentences.chinese: 我乘公共汽车去旧金山。

sentences.english: Buses run at 15 and 30 minutes past the hour.
sentences.chinese: 公共汽车在每小时的15分和30分时发车。

detailed_translations.english: a large vehicle that people pay to travel on

name: beep
trans: n. 哔哔的声音；警笛声

name: by
trans: prep. 通过；被；依据；经由；在附近；在……之前
adv. 通过；经过；附近；[互联网] 白俄罗斯的国家代码顶级域名

sentences.english: She stood by the window.
I was attacked by a dog.
a church designed by the famous architect, Sir Christopher Wren
sentences.chinese: 著名建筑师克里斯托弗·雷恩爵士设计的一座教堂

sentences.english: We are all alarmed by the rise in violent crime.
sentences.chinese: 我们都对暴力罪案的增加感到忧虑。

sentences.english: interference by the state in the affairs of the Church
sentences.chinese: 国家对教会事务的干预

sentences.english: his appointment by the BBC as a producer
sentences.chinese: 英国广播公司委任他为制片人

detailed_translations.english: beside or near something

sentences.english: It’s a long walk. Maybe we should get the bus.
sentences.chinese: 走着去很远，或许我们应该乘公共汽车。

sentences.english: Rosanna and Forbes walked in silence.
sentences.chinese: 罗莎娜与福布斯默默地走着。

sentences.english: We walked into the foyer.
I walked a few steps toward the fence.

detailed_translations.english: a journey that you make by walking, especially for exercise or enjoyment
When you walk, you move forward by putting one foot in front of the other in a regular way

name: goes
trans: vi. 前进；行走（go的第三人称单数形式

name: work
trans: n. 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
vt. 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进

sentences.english: There isn’t a lot of work at this time of the year.
sentences.chinese: 每年这个时候工作机会都不多。

sentences.english: He’s been out of work (= without a job ) for two years.
More people are in work (= have a job ) than ten years ago.
sentences.chinese: 现在有工作的人比十年前多。

detailed_translations.chinese: 工作；[物] 功；产品；操作；职业；行为；事业；工厂；著作；文学、音乐或艺术作品
detailed_translations.english: a job or activity that you do regularly, especially in order to earn money

detailed_translations.chinese: 使工作；操作；经营；使缓慢前进
detailed_translations.english: to do the activities and duties that are part of your job

name: bike
trans: vi. 骑自行车（或摩托车）

sentences.english: Let’s go for a bike ride.
sentences.chinese: 我们去骑会儿自行车吧。

sentences.english: She bikes to work every day.

detailed_translations.english: a bicycle
to ride a bicycle

name: with
trans: prep. 用；随着；支持；和…在一起

sentences.english: I saw Bob in town with his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 我看到鲍勃与他的女朋友一起在镇上。

sentences.english: Put this bag with the others.
sentences.chinese: 把这个包和其他的包放在一起。

sentences.english: I always wear these shoes with this dress.
sentences.chinese: 这双鞋子我总是和这条裙子一起穿。

sentences.english: Mix the powder with boiling water.
You’d better bring your passport with you.

detailed_translations.english: used to say that two or more people or things are together in the same place

name: run
trans: n. 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
vt. 管理，经营；运行；参赛

sentences.english: For a while, she ran a restaurant in Boston.
sentences.chinese: 有一段时间她在波士顿开餐馆。

sentences.english: Many people don’t care who runs the country.
sentences.chinese: 很多人不在乎由谁统治国家。

sentences.english: Courses are currently being run in London and Edinburgh.
sentences.chinese: 目前伦敦和爱丁堡两地都开设了这些课程。

sentences.english: Many people belong to a pension scheme run by their employers.
sentences.chinese: 许多人参加了由雇主管理的养老金计划。

sentences.english: a state-run (= controlled by the government ) television station

detailed_translations.english: to organize or be in charge of an activity, business, organization, or country

detailed_translations.chinese: 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
detailed_translations.english: to be very busy and continuously rushing about

sentences.english: The school holidays start tomorrow.
a national holiday

detailed_translations.english: a time of rest from work, school etc

name: then
trans: adv. 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外

sentences.english: I wish I had known then what I know now.
sentences.chinese: 我真希望那时我就知道现在所知道的一切。

sentences.english: It was then that I realised she’d tricked me.
sentences.chinese: 直到那时我才知道她骗了我。

sentences.english: He started his career in St Petersburg – or Leningrad as it then was.
sentences.chinese: 他在圣彼得堡——当时叫列宁格勒——开始他的事业。

sentences.english: They met in 1942 and from then on (= starting at that time ) they were firm friends.
sentences.chinese: 他们1942年认识，从那时起就一直是好朋友。

sentences.english: Silently she closed the door. Just then she heard a noise.
sentences.chinese: 她默不作声地关上了门。 就在那时，她听到有声响。

sentences.english: I was paid £1,000, which was a lot of money back then (= a long time ago when things were different ) in the 1950s.
sentences.chinese: 他们给了我1,000英镑，在20世纪50年代那可是一大笔钱。

detailed_translations.chinese: 然后；那么；于是；当时；此外
detailed_translations.english: at a particular time in the past or future

name: ship
trans: vt. 运送，乘船；以船运送
vi. 上船；乘船旅行；当船员

sentences.english: We'll ship your order to the address we print on your cheques.
sentences.chinese: 我们将把你预订的货物送到我们印在你单据上的地址。

detailed_translations.english: to send goods somewhere by ship, plane, truck etc
a large boat used for carrying people or goods across the sea

name: plane
trans: n. 飞机；平面；程度，水平
vt. 刨平；用刨子刨；掠过水面
vi. 刨；乘飞机旅行；翱翔

sentences.english: It is a big airline with a large fleet of planes.
sentences.chinese: 这是一家大航空公司，拥有庞大的机群。

sentences.english: It’s much quicker to go by plane.
She slept on the plane.

detailed_translations.english: a vehicle that flies in the air and has wings and at least one engine

name: love
trans: n. 恋爱；亲爱的；酷爱；喜爱的事物；爱情，爱意；疼爱；热爱；爱人，所爱之物
v. 爱，热爱；爱戴；赞美，称赞；喜爱；喜好；喜欢；爱慕

sentences.english: I love you, Tracy.
He was the only man she had ever loved.
sentences.chinese: 他是她唯一爱过的男人。

sentences.english: What these kids need is love and support.
sentences.chinese: 这些孩子需要的是关心和支持。

detailed_translations.english: to have a strong feeling of  affection  for someone, combined with sexual attraction
a strong feeling of caring about someone, especially a member of your family or a close friend

name: watches
trans: v. 观看；值夜班（watch的单三形式）

name: weekend
trans: n. 周末，周末休假；周末聚会

sentences.english: Are you doing anything nice this weekend?
sentences.chinese: 这个周末你有什么好的安排？

sentences.english: Tony has been unwell over the weekend (= during the weekend ).
sentences.chinese: 托尼这个周末身体不舒服。

sentences.english: We’re going to Paris for a long weekend (= Saturday and Sunday, and also Friday or Monday, or both ).
sentences.chinese: 我们要到巴黎去度一个长周末。

detailed_translations.chinese: 周末，周末休假；周末聚会
detailed_translations.english: Saturday and Sunday, especially considered as time when you do not work
to spend the weekend somewhere

sentences.english: I can’t read your writing.
She picked up the letter and read it.
Read the instructions carefully before you start.
sentences.chinese: 开始前要仔细阅读说明。

sentences.english: children who are just learning to read and write
sentences.chinese: 刚刚开始学习读和写的儿童

sentences.english: Her books are quite widely read (= read by a lot of people ) .
When I was young, I read every one of his books from cover to cover (= read all of something because you are very interested ) .
sentences.chinese: 我小时候，他的每一本书我都从头到尾一页不落地看过。

detailed_translations.english: to look at written words and understand what they mean
to look at written words and understand what they mean

name: come
trans: vi. 来；开始；出现；发生；变成；到达

sentences.english: Let me know when they come.
Can you come here for a minute?
sentences.chinese: 你到这里来一会儿好吗？

sentences.english: Come a bit closer and you’ll be able to see better.
sentences.chinese: 靠近一些就能看得更清楚。

sentences.english: What time will you be coming home ?

detailed_translations.english: to move towards you or arrive at the place where you are

name: play
trans: vt. 游戏；扮演；演奏；播放；同…比赛
vi. 演奏；玩耍；上演；参加比赛

sentences.english: Kids were playing and chasing each other.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们在互相追逐嬉闹。

sentences.english: He’s learning to play the piano.

detailed_translations.english: when children play, they do things that they enjoy, often with other people or with toys

sentences.english: Jean accompanied her on the piano .

detailed_translations.english: a large musical instrument that has a long row of black and white  key s  . You play the piano by sitting in front of it and pressing the keys.

sentences.english: I often listen to classic music when I’m in the car.
sentences.chinese: 我在车上经常听古典音乐。

sentences.english: A new piece of music was specially written for the occasion.
sentences.chinese: 为了这个活动专门写了一首新曲子。

sentences.english: I left my music at home.

detailed_translations.english: a series of sounds made by instruments or voices in a way that is pleasant or exciting

sentences.english: Listen! There’s a strange noise in the engine.
sentences.chinese: 听！引擎发出奇怪的声音。

sentences.english: I told him not to go, but he just wouldn’t listen.
sentences.chinese: 我叫他不要去，可他就是不听。

detailed_translations.english: to pay attention to what someone is saying or to a sound that you can hear

name: CD
trans: abbr. 光盘，激光唱片（Compact Disc）；呼叫设备（Calling Device）；中央地区（Central District）；商务部（Commerce Department）

detailed_translations.chinese: 光盘，激光唱片（Compact Disc）；呼叫设备（Calling Device）；中央地区（Central District）；商务部（Commerce Department）

sentences.english: a big bass drum
1,000 people marched, beating drums and carrying flags.
Jones played the drums in an all-girl band.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯在一个女子乐队里打鼓。

sentences.english: a brake drum
a 5 gallon oil drum

detailed_translations.english: a musical instrument made of skin stretched over a circular frame, played by hitting it with your hand or a stick

sentences.english: I like winter because we play soccer!
sentences.chinese: 我喜欢冬天因为我们踢足球！

sentences.english: Well, the worst of the winter should be over.
sentences.chinese: 不过，冬天最糟糕的一段日子总该过去了。

sentences.english: Do you like summer? Yes, but I like winter better.
sentences.chinese: 你喜欢夏天吗？是的，但是我更喜欢冬天。

detailed_translations.english: the season after autumn and before spring, when the weather is coldest

name: fly
trans: n. 飞行；苍蝇；两翼昆虫

sentences.english: Ellen flew across the room and greeted her uncle with a kiss.
sentences.chinese: 埃伦从房间那头飞奔过来，给了她叔叔一个吻。

sentences.english: By the time the police arrived, the men had flown.
sentences.chinese: 警察赶到时，那些人已经逃走了。

detailed_translations.english: to move somewhere quickly and suddenly

name: in
trans: prep. 按照（表示方式）；从事于；在…之内
n. 执政者；门路；知情者
adv. 进入；当选；（服装等）时髦；在屋里

sentences.english: There’s some sugar in the cupboard.
My mother was in the kitchen.
He took us for a drive in his new car.
sentences.chinese: 他开着他的新车载我们去兜风。

sentences.english: I found her sitting up in bed.
sentences.chinese: 我发现她直直地坐在床上。

sentences.english: Manson spent fifteen years in prison.
a hole in the ground
Mr Fisher is in Boston this week.
sentences.chinese: 费希尔先生本周在波士顿。

sentences.english: My parents live in New Zealand now.
I never went in pubs.

detailed_translations.english: used with the name of a container, place, or area to say where someone or something is

name: spring
trans: n. 春天；弹簧；泉水；活力；跳跃
vt. 使跳起；使爆炸；突然提出；使弹开
vi. 生长；涌出；跃出；裂开

sentences.english: He sprang to his feet (= stood up suddenly ) and rushed after her.
sentences.chinese: 他腾地站起身，冲过去追她。

sentences.english: There are several hot springs in the area.
With a spring, the cat leapt on to the table.

detailed_translations.english: to move suddenly and quickly in a particular direction, especially by jumping
a place where water comes up naturally from the ground

sentences.english: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.chinese: 每年夏天我们都驾车出外旅行。

sentences.english: Food must be refrigerated in summer.
sentences.chinese: 食物在夏天必须加以冷藏。

sentences.english: After a summer here the poorest sheep and cattle grow strong and fat.
sentences.chinese: 经过一个夏天， 连最差的牛羊在这里也长得又肥又壮了。

name: autumn
trans: n. 秋天；成熟期；渐衰期，凋落期

sentences.english: autumn mists

detailed_translations.english: the season between summer and winter, when leaves change colour and the weather becomes cooler

name: warm
trans: vt. 使…兴奋；使…温暖；使…感兴趣

sentences.english: The house was lovely and warm.
I hope we get some warm weather soon.
sentences.chinese: 我希望天气很快就会回暖。

sentences.english: I’ve put your dinner in the oven to keep it warm.
sentences.chinese: 我把你的饭菜放进了烤箱里保温。

sentences.english: warm water

detailed_translations.english: slightly hot, especially in a pleasant way
to make someone or something warm or warmer, or to become warm or warmer

name: wear
trans: v. 穿着；用旧；耗损；面露

sentences.english: The cushions are starting to wear a little.
sentences.chinese: 这些靠垫开始有点磨破了。

sentences.english: His jeans have worn thin at the knees.
sentences.chinese: 他牛仔裤的膝盖处已经磨薄了。

sentences.english: You’ve worn a hole in your sock.

detailed_translations.english: to become thinner or weaker after continuous use, or to make something do this

name: jacket
trans: n. 羽绒滑雪衫；西装短外套；短上衣，夹克；土豆皮；书籍的护封；文件套，公文夹
vt. 给…穿夹克；给…装护套；给…包上护封；〈口〉打

sentences.english: He unzipped his jacket.
The bitter wind cut through his jacket.
sentences.chinese: 刺骨的冷风吹透了他的夹克衫。

sentences.english: When I grew out of my jacket,I gave it to my little brother.
sentences.chinese: 我长得穿不下我的夹克衫了，便把它给我弟弟穿。

detailed_translations.english: a short light coat

name: sunglasses
trans: n. 太阳镜；凸透镜（sunglass的复数）

sentences.english: What do you think of my new sunglasses?
sentences.chinese: 你觉得我的新太阳镜怎么样？

sentences.english: What color should I choose for my sunglasses?
sentences.chinese: 我该挑一副什么颜色的太阳镜呢？

sentences.english: I can’t see her eyes, but I can see her eyebrows above the sunglasses.
sentences.chinese: 我看不到她的眼睛，但是能看到她露在太阳镜上面的眉毛。

detailed_translations.english: dark glasses that you wear to protect your eyes when the sun is very bright

name: cool
trans: adj. 凉爽的；冷静的；出色的
vt. 使…冷却；使…平静下来

sentences.english: She swam out into the cool water.
sentences.chinese: 她往外游向清凉的水里。

sentences.english: The evening air was cool.
Relax in the sun with a cool drink.
sentences.chinese: 在阳光下喝杯清凉饮料放松一下。

sentences.english: the cooler weather of September

detailed_translations.english: low in temperature, but not cold, often in a way that feels pleasant
to make something slightly colder, or to become slightly colder
a temperature that is pleasantly cold
used to tell someone to stop being angry, violent etc

name: sweater
trans: n. 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂

sentences.english: Somebody pinched my sweater.

detailed_translations.chinese: 毛线衣，运动衫；大量出汗的人，发汗剂
detailed_translations.english: a piece of warm wool or cotton clothing with long sleeves, which covers the top half of your body

sentences.english: a pair of gloves
boxing gloves

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing that you wear on your hand in order to protect it or keep it warm

name: cold
trans: adj. 寒冷的；冷淡的，不热情的；失去知觉的

sentences.english: She splashed her face with cold water.
a blast of cold air
We slept on the cold ground.
The house felt cold and empty.
sentences.chinese: 屋子里感觉很冷，空荡荡的。

sentences.english: Martin was really cold towards me at the party.
sentences.chinese: 马丁在聚会上对我非常冷淡。

sentences.english: I was shivering with cold.

detailed_translations.english: something that is cold has a low temperature
a low temperature or cold weather

sentences.english: Billy! Put your coat on , it’s cold outside!
sentences.chinese: 比利！穿上外套，外面很冷！

sentences.english: The kids took off their coats and threw them on the floor.
sentences.chinese: 孩子们脱下外套扔在地板上。

sentences.english: I need a new winter coat .
The lab assistants wear long white coats.
sentences.chinese: 实验室助手穿着白色的长外套。

detailed_translations.english: a piece of clothing with long sleeves that is worn over your clothes to protect them or to keep you warm
to cover something with a thin layer of something else

name: year
trans: n. 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生

sentences.english: I arrived here two years ago.
We’ve known each other for over a year.
It’s almost a year since Sue died.
Jodi is 15 years old.
a three-year business plan
a four-year-old child

detailed_translations.chinese: 年；年度；历年；年纪；一年的期间；某年级的学生
detailed_translations.english: a period of about 365 days or 12 months, measured from any particular time

name: come in
trans: na. 进入；当选；上台；(党派)组阁

name: present
trans: vt. 提出；介绍；呈现；赠送

sentences.english: She was presented with an award .

detailed_translations.english: to give something to someone, for example at a formal or official occasion

name: dumpling
trans: n. 饺子，汤团；面团布丁

sentences.english: chicken and dumplings

detailed_translations.english: a round lump of flour and fat mixed with water, cooked in boiling liquid and served with meat

sentences.english: Felix chatted cheerfully as he ate.
sentences.chinese: 费利克斯一边吃一边兴奋地聊天。

sentences.english: A small girl was eating an ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 一个小女孩在吃冰激凌。

sentences.english: We had plenty to eat and drink.
It’s important to eat healthily when you are pregnant.
sentences.chinese: 怀孕的时候吃得健康很重要。

sentences.english: I exercise and eat right and get plenty of sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我做运动，饮食得当，睡眠充足。

sentences.english: Would you like something to eat?
She can eat like a horse and never put on weight.
sentences.chinese: 她可以吃得很多，但体重从来不会增加。

sentences.english: We stopped at McDonalds to get a bite to eat.
sentences.chinese: 我们在麦当劳停下来吃点东西。

sentences.english: Good eating habits are the best way of preventing infection.
sentences.chinese: 良好的饮食习惯是预防感染的最佳方法。

sentences.english: ‘More cake?’ ‘No thanks, I couldn’t eat another thing.’
sentences.chinese: “再来点蛋糕？” “不要了，谢谢。 我再也吃不下了。”

sentences.english: No chicken for me. I don’t eat meat (= I never eat meat ).
sentences.chinese: 我不要鸡肉，我不吃肉的。

sentences.english: Does Rob eat fish?

detailed_translations.english: to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it
to put food in your mouth and chew and swallow it

name: Chinese
trans: adj. 中国的，中国人的；中国话的

sentences.english: Do you fancy going out for a Chinese?
sentences.chinese: 你想不想出去吃顿中餐？

detailed_translations.english: relating to China, its people, or its language
people from China

name: hair
trans: adj. 毛发的；护理毛发的；用毛发制成的
vi. 生长毛发；形成毛状纤维

sentences.english: Her hair was short and dark.
a short fat man with no hair on his head
The cat has left white hairs all over the sofa.
sentences.chinese: 白色的猫毛掉得满沙发都是。

detailed_translations.english: the mass of things like fine threads that grows on your head

sentences.english: I played firecracker but I hurt my finger with the fire.
sentences.chinese: 在我玩爆竹的时候，伤着了我的手指。

sentences.english: As we came in the second time, Kasokola was ready, and we put the first firecracker straight into the campfire.
sentences.chinese: 我们再次飞回来时，卡索科拉已经准备好了。 我们第一发爆竹炸弹径直射进了篝火中。

sentences.english: Red firecracker chaff left behind after store-opening celebrations attests to the optimism of many investors.
sentences.chinese: 市场开张庆典后的爆竹残渣,足以印证多数投资者的乐观情绪.

detailed_translations.english: a small  firework  that explodes loudly

sentences.english: Our guests have arrived.
Has anyone phoned?
We’ve been spending too much money.
sentences.chinese: 我们已经花掉太多钱了。

sentences.english: I hadn’t seen him for 15 years.
‘I hope you’ve read the instructions.’ ‘Yes, of course I have.’
sentences.chinese: “我希望你已经看过使用说明了。”“当然看过了。”

sentences.english: You haven’t done much, have you?
They used to have a Mercedes Benz.
sentences.chinese: 他们曾经拥有一辆奔驰汽车。

sentences.english: She sat down and had another drink.

detailed_translations.chinese: （与过去分词连用构成完成时）
detailed_translations.english: used with past participles to form perfect tenses
used to say that someone owns something or that it is available for them to use

name: Christmas
trans: n. 圣诞节；圣诞节期间

sentences.english: Are you going home for Christmas?
a Christmas present
the Christmas holidays
Merry Christmas and a happy New Year everyone!
sentences.chinese: 祝大家圣诞快乐、新年快乐！

detailed_translations.english: the period of time around December 25th, the day when Christians celebrate the birth of Christ

name: wish
trans: vt. 祝愿；渴望；向…致问候语

sentences.english: Close your eyes and make a wish.

detailed_translations.english: a desire to do something, to have something, or to have something happen
to want something to be true although you know it is either impossible or unlikely

name: dinner
trans: n. 晚餐，晚宴；宴会；正餐

sentences.english: What time do you usually have dinner?
We’re having fish for dinner tonight.
What’s for dinner?
the Club’s annual dinner

detailed_translations.english: the main meal of the day, eaten in the middle of the day or the evening
